title: How to learn es6blog
content:
Hello World!

Next.js is a powerful React-based framework that enables developers to build server-rendered web applications with ease. It's designed to simplify the development process by providing a set of features that are not available out of the box in React, such as server-side rendering, static site generation, and automatic code splitting. Next.js is developed by Vercel and is known for its performance and SEO benefits.
author: Brendan Eich
metaDesc: How to learn nextjs,you will learn more knowledge of nextjs in few minutes
